mapper.select: SELECT S.SURVEY_NO, TOPIC, TO_CHAR("START", 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS "START", TO_CHAR("END", 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS "END", COUNT(DISTINCT R.MEM_NO)-1 AS RESP_MEMBER, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER)-1 AS TOTAL_MEMBER, CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM SURVEY_RESULT WHERE SURVEY_NO = S.SURVEY_NO AND MEM_NO = #{memNo} ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS PARTICIPATION FROM SURVEY S LEFT JOIN SURVEY_RESULT R ON S.SURVEY_NO = R.SURVEY_NO GROUP BY S.SURVEY_NO, TOPIC, "START", "END"
SELECT SURVEY_NO, TOPIC, CONTENT, TO_CHAR("START", 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS "START", TO_CHAR("END", 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS "END" FROM SURVEY s WHERE SURVEY_NO = #{surveyNo}
SELECT SURVEY_NO, MEM_NO, MEM_NAME QUESTION, OPTION_NO, OPTION_ANNOTATION FROM SURVEY_RESULT JOIN MEMBER USING (MEM_NO) WHERE SURVEY_NO = #{surveyNo} AND MEM_NO = 0 ORDER BY OPTION_NO ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SURVEY_RESULT VALUES ( #{surveyNo}, #{memNo}, DEFAULT, #{optionNo}, DEFAULT )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*)-1 AS TOTAL_MEMBER FROM MEMBER
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT R.MEM_NO)-1 AS RESP_MEMBER FROM SURVEY S LEFT JOIN SURVEY_RESULT R ON S.SURVEY_NO = R.SURVEY_NO WHERE S.SURVEY_NO = #{surveyNo}
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT MEM_NO)-1 FROM SURVEY_RESULT WHERE SURVEY_NO = #{surveyNo} GROUP BY OPTION_NO ORDER BY OPTION_NO ASC
